title: Order of Adjectives
content: It is a [big old|old big] table.
explanationEnUs: General order: Opinion -> Size -> Age -> Color -> Origin -> Material.
explanationZhTw: 一般順序：觀點 -> 大小 -> 年齡 -> 顏色 -> 產地 -> 材質。
explanationZhCn: 一般顺序：观点 -> 大小 -> 年龄 -> 颜色 -> 产地 -> 材质。

content: It is a [expensive Italian|Italian expensive] dress.
